descriptionHtml:
[center][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?]


[img]https://scontent.fads1-1.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t34.0-12/19964859_1946116692337706_1766952518_n.png?oh=427850c3f44b144bcb3ec4de97586236&oe=59665BE8[/img][/url]




[/center]THIS IS THE OLDEST VERSION OF AMBER, THIS PRESET ALMOST LOOKS NOTHING LIKE MY FOLLOWER, THIS IS JUST HER BASE




Amber is fully customized and sculpted.

This is my first post, if anybody could help me with the screenshots, it would be greatly appreciated!


Background:

This is Amber The Beautiful Nord. 
She is constantly being harassed by the barbaric men in her small town of Ivarstead,
she works at the local inn as a maiden, but one day a man assaulted her and she got sick of everything and savagely murdered every man she lay eyes on. 
Until one day all of Skyrim's  holds put a bounty on her head for her murderous crimes, and this is where you come in....


Requirements:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]

Recommendations:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide and Outfit Studio
[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28946/?]Sporty Sexy Sweat[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?]Alternate Start - Live Another Life[/url]      (For backstory and a more immersive feel)




Thank you for the screenshots guys!
